name: Tracking-with-rnn
body:
# First Step towards model-free, anonymous object tracking with recurrent neural networks

[Paper](http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.06425)

### Video list

YouTube gave me a community guideline strike for one of our video, still appealing and waiting for result so I have to temporarily post our videos on GitHub.  They'll be migrated to YouTube later.

The videos are at:

1. [ConvTracker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/ConvTracker%20trained%20on%20single%20MNIST-1.mp4)
2. [RecTracker-ID on single moving object](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/RecTrackerID%20trained%20on%20single%20MNIST-1.mp4)
3. [RecTracker-ID on multiple moving object](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/RecTrackerID%20trained%20on%20single%20but%20tested%20on%20multiple.mp4)
4. [RecTracker-Att-1 on single object, with attention displayed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/RecTracker-Att-1%20on%20single%20object%20with%20attention.mp4)
5. [RecTracker-Att-1 on multiple object, with attention displayed](https://github.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/blob/master/RecTracker-Att-1%20distracted%20away%20in%20two%20moving%20objects.mp4)
6. [RecTracker-Att-1 on multiple object, with mask displayed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/RecTracker-Att-1%20with%20Mask%20displayed.mp4)
7. [RecTracker-Att-3 on multiple object, with mask displayed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/BarclayII/tracking-with-rnn/master/RecTracker-Att-3%20with%20mask%20displayed.mp4)

### Authors

Quan Gan, Qipeng Guo (Fudan University)
Zheng Zhang (NYU Shanghai)
KyungHyun Cho (NYU)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
